name: Unmasking Day
roleZh: 技术美术与客户端程序
desc: A retro-styled text-based deduction game built at Global Game Jam 2026. Dive into hidden truths with an AI called the Unmasking System.
descZh: Global Game Jam 2026 上完成的复古风格文字推理游戏。借助名为「Unmasking 系统」的 AI，潜入网络深水，挖掘被隐藏的真相。
detail: A retro-styled text-based deduction game created during Global Game Jam 2026. You play as a user who has gained beta access to the Unmasking System — an AI tool that dives into the hidden depths of the internet to excavate buried truths. As the boundary between the virtual and the real blurs, can you still tell what is a disguise and what is genuine?
detailZh: 在 Global Game Jam 2026 上完成的复古风格文字推理游戏。玩家扮演一名获得「Unmasking 系统」内测资格的用户，这个 AI 工具能潜入网络深水，挖掘被隐藏的真相。当虚拟与现实的边界逐渐模糊，你是否还能分辨——什么是伪装，什么又是真实？
awards: GGJ 2026 Chongqing — Best Art Style & Best Game Design
awardsZh: GGJ 2026 重庆站 — 最佳美术风格 & 最佳游戏设计

name: Dong! Da-Dong!
roleZh: 技术美术与客户端程序
desc: A rhythm-action game where drumbeats are your contract, your battle, and your salvation. miHoYo 2025 Game Design Competition — National 1st Place.
descZh: 鼓点即契约、即战斗、即拯救的节奏动作游戏。米哈游游戏策划大赛 2025 全国第一名。
detail: "Dancing together" is not merely a form of interaction — it is a philosophical attitude of resonating with nature, with living beings, and with all of existence. In Dong! Da-Dong!, dancing is a contract, a battle, and a salvation. We invite players to become Drum Spiritists who dance with all things, conversing with the game world through the primal rhythms of tribal drumbeats — summoning spirits of nature and spirits of beasts to dispel the Silence that erodes the world, so that life may surge once more across the land with every beat and every dance.
detailZh: 「共舞」不仅是一种互动方式，更是一种与自然、生灵、乃至整个存在共鸣的哲学态度。在《咚！哒咚！》中，共舞是契约，是战斗，也是拯救。我们期待玩家成为与万物共舞的「鼓灵者」，通过原始部落的鼓点节奏与游戏世界对话，召唤自然之灵与动物之灵，驱散侵蚀世界的「静默」，让生机随着鼓点与舞蹈，在这片土地上重新澎湃。
awards: miHoYo 2025 Game Design Competition — National 1st Place
awardsZh: 米哈游游戏策划大赛 2025 — 全国第一名

name: Organic Dominion
roleZh: 技术美术与客户端程序
desc: An automation-factory meets swarm-evolution strategy game. Breed mutant bugs, build living assembly lines, and conquer an alien planet.
descZh: 融合自动化工厂与虫群进化的策略游戏。培育变异虫群，建立活体流水线，征服整颗星球。
detail: Organic Dominion is a strategy game that fuses factory automation with swarm evolution. You play as a newborn Hive Mother, commanding worker drones to build living assembly lines while hunting the planet's exotic creatures to plunder their genes. Through gene synthesis and mutation, your bugs can evolve dozens of forms — fire-breathing, flight, venom, gigantification and more — stacking traits into a one-of-a-kind biological army. No micro required: just plan your evolution and production, then drown every enemy beneath an endless tide of mutant swarms. Play the swarm. Devour your prey. Conquer the planet.
detailZh: 《有机统治》是一款融合自动化工厂与虫群进化的策略游戏。你将扮演新生虫母，指挥工蜂建立活体流水线，并猎杀星球上的奇异生物，掠夺它们的基因。通过基因合成与变异，你的虫子可以进化出喷火、飞行、剧毒、巨大化等数十种形态，通过叠加组合可以形成独一无二的生物大军。无需繁琐操作，只需规划进化与生产，用无穷无尽的变异虫潮淹没一切敌人。扮演虫族，吞噬猎物，然后征服整个星球！
awards: Tsinghua SIGS Interactive Media Workshop — Silver Award
awardsZh: 清华大学互动媒体技术工作坊 — 银奖

name: TREE
roleZh: 技术美术与客户端程序
desc: Begin from the void, nurture the World Tree, and cultivate an ever-evolving ecosystem of whispering, thinking, pulsing life.
descZh: 从一片虚无开始，孕育世界树，培育万物生灵构成的生态系统。
detail: Starting from the void, you nurture a World Tree — planting seeds, cultivating grasslands, and propagating forests. Everything thinks, whispers, and pulses with life. By continuously synthesizing basic elements, you shape objects and ecological landscapes, striving to maintain the ecosystem's balance and elevate its prosperity.
detailZh: 从一片虚无开始，孕育世界树，种下种子，培育草原，繁衍森林……万物都会思考、低语、跳动。通过不断合成各种基础元素，形成各种物体和生态地貌，并尽力维护系统的生态平衡，提升丰饶度。

name: Cat Expected Here
roleZh: 技术美术与客户端程序
desc: A casual cat-teasing puzzle game! Fire lasers from security cameras to guide quirky cats — fulfill client requests, ace your internship, and live out your feline-filled dream job.
descZh: 以休闲逗猫为核心的轻解谜游戏！从监控视角发射激光，指引随心所欲的猫咪行动——满足客户要求，提高业绩，坐拥临喵美景，尽享喵喵至尊。
detail:
It’s graduation season, and after being rejected time and again for lacking internship experience, you stumble upon an unusual job listing… Wait — you get to admire all kinds of cats remotely?! And fire lasers from security cameras to catch their attention?! And if you take care of the cats to the clients’ satisfaction, they’ll even cover your housing and offer a full-time position?!

⭐ A casual cat-teasing puzzle game at its core!
⭐ Fire lasers from security cameras to guide the cats’ movements!
⭐ But cats will be cats — they do whatever they please…
⭐ Meet client objectives and boost your performance!
⭐ Bonus dream stages: pure cat-teasing fun, racing levels, and exploration-based puzzle levels!
detailZh:
正值毕业季，却因为没有实习经历而屡屡被拒绝的你，偶然在招聘平台上刷到了一份不一样的实习工作……
什么？！能够云吸各种各样的猫？！
什么？！能够使用监控摄像头发射激光去抓住他们的注意力？！
什么？！只要按照客户要求把猫照顾好，这工作还能包住宿给补贴带转正？！

⭐ 以休闲逗猫为核心的轻解谜游戏！
⭐ 从监控视角发射激光，指引猫咪的行动吧！
⭐ 哦不，你知道的，猫咪向来是一种随心所欲的生物……
⭐ 满足客户所要求的目标，提高业绩！
⭐ 梦里什么都有……？附带娱乐性质的纯享逗猫、赛车关卡、与基于空间探索的纯解谜关卡哦！
